import React from 'react' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import {Row, Col ,Image, ListGroup, Card, Button} from 'react-bootstrap' import Rating from '../components/Rating' import products from '../products' const ProductScreens = ({match}) => { const product= products.find((p) => p._id===match.params.id) return ( <> Go Back

{product.name}

Price: ₹ {product.price}

Description: {product.description} Price: ₹ {product.price} Status: {product.countInStock>0 ? 'In Stock': 'Out Of Stock'} ) } export default ProductScreens
